javolver

Class Individual

  • java.lang.Object
    • javolver.Individual

  • public abstract class Individual
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the base class that should be used to create custom individual types to feed into the evolver.
    Individual provides a simple array of floats to represent the 'DNA' of the individual,
    these floats can be mapped by the user to any data type they require.
    Since:
    2016-04-01

    • Field Detail

      • dna

        public Chromosome dna
        Holds the genetic information for the individual as an array of doubles Each type of individual should map double values to theie required data ranages.

      • processed

        protected boolean processed
        A latch variable that represents whether the individual has being scored or not. Scoring can be computationally intensive so this helps prevent multiple scoring events.

      • score

        protected double score
        The score of this individual, higher is better.

      • diversity

        protected double diversity

      • rankScore

        protected int rankScore

      • rankDiversity

        protected int rankDiversity

      • calculateScore

        public abstract double calculateScore()
        Calculate the score of the individual.
        Returns:
        Double value representing the score of the individual. Higher is better.

      • getScore

        public double getScore()
        Return score of this individual. If the individual has not yet been processed, call calculateScore() first.
        Returns:
        Double value representing the score of the individual. Higher is better.
